title: 怎么用命令方块放一个有东西发射器？
author: 吴鸣
txt_content: 怎么用命令方块放一个有东西发射器？里面有一个攻击+100 锋利附魔10级的钻石剑。

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
吴鸣 发表于 2015-7-17 13:46
因为不会才问的...
行
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:dispenser 0 replace 
{Items:[{id:276,Count:5,Slot:物品位置,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:10}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:100.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}}]}

replies.author: 吴鸣
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2015-7-17 13:20

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-209891-1-1.html
http://www.m ...
因为不会才问的...

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content:
setblock ~ ~1 ~ dispenser {Items:[{id:发射物,Slot:0~8,Count:x}]}、
把坐标、发射物、要放在那个槽（slot）和数目Count自己写好就行
